byline.contributor: Anemona Hartocollis contributed reporting from Padborg, Denmark.

abstract: Influx of migrants from Middle East and Africa arriving in Europe has brought out best and worst reactions among Europeans; while thousands of volunteers have offered support, reports of scuffles and attacks hint that tensions are flaring even in most welcoming of countries.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of volunteers have come forward with support and material aid, but even in the most welcoming of countries, tensions have flared.

headline.main: Migrant Tide Bringing Out Europe’s Best and Worst
headline.print_headline: Migrant Tide Bringing Out Europe’s Best and Worst

snippet: Thousands of volunteers have come forward with support and material aid, but even in the most welcoming of countries, tensions have flared.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
